Love this place.  It is right next to Palau de Musica.  In Barcelona for six days and have eaten here three times.   Small plates about 5 to 8 euros each.   Had houmus with little toast, great salad with good mixed lettuce and walnuts,  pork loin,  sirloin, chicken skewers,  calamari,  danish meatballs,  empanadas, etc.  Great bar menu including mojitos and sangria made with cava aka champagne. Great service as well.   Get there early because many people like this place too.
